title: John Wick
description: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max helps a rebellious woman and a group of female prisoners.

title: Mission: Impossible – Fallout
description: Ethan Hunt and his team must stop a global catastrophe while being pursued by assassins.

title: Nobody
description: An underestimated dad reveals his dark past after burglars target his home.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After 30 years, Maverick returns to train a new generation of elite pilots.

title: No Time to Die
description: James Bond comes out of retirement to confront a new villain armed with dangerous technology.

title: The Batman
description: Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham linked to his own family.

title: Speed
description: LAPD officer Jack Traven must keep a bus rigged with a bomb from slowing down below 50 mph, while working to outsmart the bomber and save the passengers.

title: The Bourne Identity
description: A man with amnesia, Jason Bourne, discovers he’s a highly trained operative while evading assassins and uncovering a conspiracy within the CIA.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
description: Archaeologist Indiana Jones races against Nazis to find the Ark of the Covenant, embarking on a globe-trotting adventure filled with traps, fights, and ancient mysteries.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A reprogrammed Terminator protects young John Connor from a more advanced, shape-shifting Terminator sent to kill him, as they work to prevent a future apocalypse.

title: Die Hard
description: NYPD officer John McClane takes on a group of heavily armed terrorists led by Hans Gruber, who have seized a Los Angeles skyscraper where his estranged wife is among the hostages.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a chaotic criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into anarchy, forcing the Caped Crusader to confront moral and physical challenges to save the city.

title: Lethal Weapon
description: Unstable cop Martin Riggs teams up with veteran Roger Murtaugh to take down a drug-smuggling operation, blending buddy-cop banter with explosive action.

title: The Raid: Redemption
description: A SWAT team becomes trapped in a Jakarta high-rise controlled by a drug lord, fighting their way through floors of enemies in relentless, bone-crunching martial arts battles.

title: The Notebook
description: A young couple, Noah and Allie, fall passionately in love one summer, but class differences and family pressures tear them apart, only to reunite years later in an emotional journey of love and memory.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: Elizabeth Bennet navigates societal expectations and her evolving relationship with the wealthy but initially aloof Mr. Darcy in this adaptation of Jane Austen’s classic novel.

title: A Walk to Remember
description: Rebellious teen Landon falls for Jamie, a kind-hearted preacher’s daughter, whose quiet strength and faith transform his life in a touching, bittersweet love story.

title: Notting Hill
description: A humble London bookstore owner, William, falls for a famous American actress, Anna Scott, navigating the challenges of fame and cultural differences in their charming romance.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: After a painful breakup, Joel and Clementine undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories, only to rediscover their connection in a surreal, heartfelt journey.

title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
description: A divorced man, Cal, learns to navigate modern dating with the help of a suave playboy, while his family and others around him experience their own romantic entanglements.

title: When Harry Met Sally...
description: Harry and Sally, initially just friends, navigate the complexities of friendship and romance over years, debating whether men and women can truly be platonic friends.

title: La La Land
description: Aspiring actress Mia and jazz musician Sebastian chase their dreams in Los Angeles, falling in love but facing the challenges of balancing career ambitions with their relationship.

title: Amélie
description: Amélie, a shy Parisian waitress, secretly orchestrates small acts of kindness to bring joy to others, finding her own quirky romance with a mysterious stranger along the way.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Wrongly convicted banker Andy Dufresne forms a profound friendship with fellow inmate Red while enduring the hardships of prison life, finding hope in an unlikely plan for freedom.

title: Parasite
description: A poor South Korean family cunningly infiltrates the lives of a wealthy household, leading to a darkly comedic and shocking exploration of class disparity and deception.

title: Schindler’s List
description: German industrialist Oskar Schindler risks everything to save over a thousand Jewish refugees from the Holocaust by employing them in his factory during World War II.

title: 12 Years a Slave
description: Solomon Northup, a free Black man, is kidnapped and sold into slavery in 1840s America, enduring brutal conditions while clinging to hope for his freedom in this harrowing true story.

title: There Will Be Blood
description: Ruthless oilman Daniel Plainview rises to power in early 20th-century America, clashing with a young preacher in a gripping tale of greed, ambition, and moral decay.

title: Moonlight
description: Chiron, a young Black man, navigates his identity and sexuality across three stages of life in Miami, grappling with poverty, bullying, and the search for connection.

title: The Godfather
description: Michael Corleone reluctantly takes over his father’s mafia empire, descending into a world of power, betrayal, and violence in this epic saga of family and crime.

title: Manchester by the Sea
description: After his brother’s death, Lee Chandler returns to his hometown to care for his nephew, confronting past tragedies and emotional wounds in a raw, understated story of grief.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest
description: Rebellious convict Randle McMurphy feigns insanity to avoid prison labor but clashes with the tyrannical Nurse Ratched in a mental institution, inspiring his fellow patients.

title: Presence
description: A family moves into a suburban house and becomes convinced they’re not alone, as a ghostly presence observes their struggles, particularly around daughter Chloe, in a haunting drama told from the ghost’s perspective.

title: Nickel Boys
description: Based on the Pulitzer Prize-winning novel, this film follows two Black teens in a brutal reform school in 1960s Florida, exploring their friendship and resilience amid systemic racism and abuse.

title: The Life of Chuck
description: Adapted from Stephen King’s novella, this buoyant drama follows the life of Chuck Krantz in reverse, blending cosmic optimism with emotional depth in a tale of love and loss.

title: Sinners
description: Twin brothers Smoke and Stack, played by Michael B. Jordan, return to their hometown during Prohibition, aiming to open a juke joint, but face a violent Irish vampire, Remmick, in this blend of historical drama and horror.

title: The Alto Knights
description: Robert De Niro delivers a dual performance as mobsters Frank Costello and Vito Genovese, exploring the intricate dynamics of the Italian underworld in the 1950s and 1960s in this slow-burn mafia saga.

title: Black Bag
description: Legendary intelligence agents George Woodhouse and Kathryn, portrayed by Michael Fassbender and Cate Blanchett, navigate a gripping espionage plot with sleek style and dry wit in Steven Soderbergh’s thriller.

title: 28 Years Later
description: A sequel to 28 Days Later, this film follows a boy and his mother (Jodie Comer) in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by infected, focusing on their bond amidst societal decay and horror.

title: F1: The Movie
description: Brad Pitt stars in a stylish racing drama about an underdog Formula 1 team, directed by Joseph Kosinski, delivering high-octane action and emotional stakes on the track.

title: Sister Midnight
description: Newlyweds Uma and Gopal struggle in a cramped Mumbai shack, with Uma’s frustrations driving a quirky, genre-bending narrative of marital tension and urban chaos.
